description: Works to trees in Bush Hill Park Conservation Area- 1x bay tree(B1): reduce by 2m in height and 0.5m in spread, 1x yew hedge (Y1): reduce height by up to 0.5m to follow a straight line across the top of the Yew hedge row, on the right side and rear of the garden, 1x yew hedge (Y2): rear left, trim height by 0.5 m and spread by 0.2m underneath pine tree and trim spread by 0.2m into formal shape.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
